title: C++ Loops Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of C++ for, while, and do-while loops!

questions.question: What is the output of this code?
questions.explanation: The post-increment operator (i++) returns the current value of i and then increments it. However, the comparison happens first, and then i is incremented before the loop body executes. So it prints 1, 2, and 3.
